full_summary:
================

**Request for Proposal: Service Recognition Platform for the Senate's Employee Service Milestone Recognition Program**

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposals - Competitive - Open Bidding

The Senate of Canada invites proposals from qualified service providers for the establishment of an online service recognition platform for the Senate's Employee Service Milestone Recognition Program.

**Contract Description**
-------------------------

The Senate is seeking a contractor to design, develop, and deliver an online service recognition platform that will enable the recognition of employees' service milestones. The platform will be used to communicate employee anniversaries and service years, facilitate the recognition of employees' service milestones, and provide a platform for employees to view and interact with their service history.

**Contract Term and Pricing**
-----------------------------

The initial contract term will be three (3) years, with the option to extend for two (2) additional one-year periods. Pricing will be negotiated as part of the contract.

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

To ensure all proposers have an equal opportunity to participate, the Senate will not accept late submissions. Proposers must ensure their submissions are complete and meet the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP). Proposers are also required to submit an electronic copy of their proposal in the format specified in the RFP.

**Assessment Criteria**
-----------------------

The Senate will evaluate proposals based on technical merit and price. The following criteria will be used to assess proposals:

* Technical merit, including the proposed platform design, functionality, and scalability
* Price, including the proposed contract price and any applicable fees

**Participation and Communication**
---------------------------------

All proposals must be submitted electronically to the contact person listed below. The Senate will not accept proposals submitted by other means. Proposers are also required to identify any proprietary information in their submissions.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For more information regarding the Request for Proposal, please contact:

Shirley Chartrand
Procurement and Contracts Officer
Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca
613-995-8888

### Annexe

#### A. Énoncé des Travaux (SOW)

* Annex to the Request for Proposal outlining the technical requirements for the online service recognition platform. Please see the Request for Proposal package for details.
